name: Catto
description:
You will play a white cat to explore and adventure in the master's study, where there are a variety of interesting challenges and rich rewards waiting for you to try and discover. In the process of exploring, you can get new abilities that will change your tail to have more interaction.

    《卡托猫》是一款解谜游戏，玩家扮演一只白猫在主人的书房里探索和冒险，这里有着各种有趣的挑战和丰富的奖励等待着玩家的尝试与发现。在探索书房的过程中，我们准备了许多冒险必备的小鱼干来奖励你的好奇心，同时将有机会得到与众不同的神奇尾巴，可以通过变换尾巴得到全新的能力，从来展开更丰富有趣的交互。

Level Design:    杜恺 Kai Du    毛常松 Changsong Mao

Program:    毛常松 Changsong Mao

3D Art:    吴铂 Bo Wu    朱果 Guo Zhu

2D Art:    徐晖 Hui Xu    朱果 Guo Zhu

VFX:    杜恺 Kai Du    毛常松 Changsong Mao

UI Design:    朱果 Guo Zhu    毛常松 Changsong Mao

Language Support

    Chinese (Simplified)

The game is a prototype and the development is paused for now.
